replies.body: tbh idk, sometime in like 2012 I think, probably would have started earlier but i believe my parents said "it's too violent" or "it has too much violence, and violence is bad"...and it is tho, i finally agree with them, slaughtering pigs is bad - they give you no bacon. Okay I think I went a bit off topic there so um yeah, I joined sometime in 2012.
